refsection.title: PARAMETERS
refsection.para:
E The sum-of-squares error.
y Matrix containing the actual network outputs, one pattern per column, each column have a correspondent in t.
t Matrix containing the targets, one pattern per column, each column have a correspondent in y.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function calculates the sum-of-squares error given y and t. Any other, user defined, error function should have the same input and output format for variables.
